symptoms: Random crank-no-start events without warning lamps.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Weak fuel pump relay intermittently failing in humidity
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Starts after waiting, no codes, relay common failure in this generation.
Moisture correlation, shared ground for PCM and starter circuit.
Rain-related events and aging transceiver ring, no security light reported though.

most_likely_cause: Intermittent fuel pump relay dropout triggered by moisture.

recommended_actions.step: Monitor fuel pump command voltage during crank with test light
recommended_actions.why: Confirms relay output under fault condition.

recommended_actions.step: Inspect main relay (PGM-FI) board for cracked solder joints
recommended_actions.why: Thermal cycling causes intermittent contact on older units.

recommended_actions.step: Check PCM and engine grounds for corrosion and retorque
recommended_actions.why: Ensures consistent reference for starter and ignition circuits.

safety_notes: Disconnect battery before working on relay panel.
Avoid sparks around fuel tank area.
disclaimers: No diagnostic trouble codes present; additional data required to confirm root cause.

confidence.assessment: Insufficient evidence to confirm the relay fault without live data.

confidence_uplift_requirements: Fuel pump relay voltage measurement during a no-start
Immobilizer status data from scan tool
Starter draw amperage when symptom occurs

customer_readiness_check.short_reason: Report requires live electrical data to meet confidence target.
